translation.en: John Wick, excommunicado.
In effect, 6:00 p.m., Eastern Standard Time.
translation.es: En vigor a partir de las 6 p. m. tiempo del este.

translation.en: I do hope that Mr Wick finds his way to safety.
translation.es: Espero que el Sr. Wick logre ponerse a salvo.

translation.en: He knew the rules, he broke them.
And killed a man on company grounds, Charon.
translation.es: Y mató a un hombre en el hotel, Charon.

translation.en: Do you expect him to make it out?
$14 million bounty on his head,
translation.es: Catorce millones de dólares por su cabeza…

translation.en: and every interested party in this city wants a piece of it.
translation.es: Todos en la ciudad quieren una parte.

translation.en: I'd say the odds are about even.
You think the hospital's there to help, man?
translation.es: ¿Crees que te ayudarán en el hospital?

translation.en: No way!
They'll kill you just as soon as they'll make you better!
But I know better, man. I know better. I know what I'm...
translation.es: Pero yo sí sé, amigo. Yo sí sé. Sé lo que…

translation.en: Tick- tock, Mr Wick. Tick- tock.
translation.es: Tic tac, Sr. Wick. Tic tac.

translation.en: Tick- tock. Tick- tock. Tick...
No time to dilly- dally, Mr Wick!
translation.es: No hay tiempo para perder el tiempo, Sr. Wick.

translation.en: The New York Public Library. You got it.
Change of plan.
To the Continental. Can you see that he's received by the concierge?
translation.es: Al Continental. ¿Puede asegurarse de que lo reciba el conserje?

translation.en: Yes, sir, Mr Wick.
Good dog. Good dog.
John Wick, excommunicado. In effect, 20 minutes.
translation.es: John Wick, Excomunicado. En vigor en 20 minutos.

translation.en: Russian Folktale. Alexander Afanasyev.
- Level two. - Thank you.
Consider your origins:
you were not made to live as brutes,
translation.es: no fuisteis creados para vivir como bestias

translation.en: but to follow virtue and knowledge.
translation.es: sino para seguir la virtud y el conocimiento.

translation.en: Dante.
Looking a little run down there, John.
Ernest... I still have time.
translation.es: Ernest. - Aún tengo tiempo. - Ya casi se acaba.

translation.en: It's almost up. Who's gonna know the difference?
translation.es: - Aún tengo tiempo. - Ya casi se acaba. ¿Quién notará la diferencia?

translation.en: You sure this is what you wanna do? Fourteen million. It's a lot of money.
translation.es: - ¿Estás seguro de que quieres hacerlo? - Catorce millones es mucho dinero.

translation.en: Not if you can't spend it.
John Wick, excommunicado.
In effect, ten minutes.
Let it be known the Bowery will honour the excommunicado.
translation.es: Avisa que el Barrio respetará el Excomunicado.

translation.en: No help, no services of any kind.
translation.es: No brindará ayuda ni dará ningún tipo de servicio.

translation.en: Doc! Doc, it's Wick!
Mr Wick. No, no. You shouldn't be here. Hour's almost up.
translation.es: Sr. Wick, no. No debería estar aquí. Ya casi es la Hora.

translation.en: I know, Doc, please. There's still time. No! I can't.
translation.es: - Doc, por favor, aún hay tiempo. - ¡No! ¡No puedo!

translation.en: I still have five minutes!
Please.
Come on. Come on.
All right, sit there.
All right, let me see. Let me see.
Puncture wound.
Ah. Went deep. Nicked the artery.
Here you go.
All right.
John Wick, excommunicado. In effect, one minute.
translation.es: John Wick, Excomunicado. En vigor en un minuto.

translation.en: Doc?
Doc? Yeah. We're halfway there.
- Aah. Five seconds. - Yeah.
John Wick, excommunicado.
In effect, in five, four...
- - Three, two...
One.
Sorry, Mr Wick.
I know. Rules. Ah, rules.
John Wick, 14 million.
Open contract is now in effect.
translation.es: El contrato abierto está en vigor.

translation.en: All services are suspended.
And away we go.
Top shelf. On the right.
Yeah. Take four.
It will give you energy. Help with the pain.
translation.es: Le dará energía, le aliviará el dolor.

translation.en: Mr Wick?
They'll never believe I stopped on the hour. But you did.
translation.es: - No creerán que me detuve a la Hora. - Pero lo hizo.

translation.en: They'll know.
Know what?
I told you where the medicine was.
translation.es: Le dije dónde estaba la medicina.

translation.en: - Where? - Here.
Just below my floating rib. Be sure not to hit my--
translation.es: Debajo de la costilla flotante. Tenga cuidado de no darme…

translation.en: Oh, wait!
One may not be enough.
Yeah. All right.
Be sure not to graze my--
Good luck, Mr Wick.
Thanks, Doc.
That's him.
Yeah. Let's go.
Get the door.
Shoot the lock.
That's him.
Yes.
Tell them he's arriving at the corner.
translation.es: Diles que se aproxima a la esquina.

translation.en: John Wick. Open contract.
Increase, 15 million.
Where are you going, Jonathan?
We are closed.
It's been a while.
And the belt.
Show him the way.
Be seeing you.
Be seeing you.
Again!
Again!
Jardani. Why have you come home?
You present this to me like an answer.
I still have my ticket.
After all the chaos you've caused for the last few weeks,
translation.es: Después del caos que has causado las últimas semanas,

translation.en: you think your ticket is valid?
Do you forget that the Ruska Roma is bound by the High Table,
translation.es: ¿Olvidas que la Orden Suprema rige a Roma Ruska

translation.en: and the High Table stands above all?
translation.es: y que la Orden Suprema es la máxima autoridad?

translation.en: They could kill me just for talking to you.
translation.es: Podrían matarme solo por hablar contigo.

translation.en: You honour me by bringing death to my front door.
translation.es: ¿Me honras trayendo la muerte a mi puerta?

translation.en: Oh, Jardani, what has become of you?
I am Jardani Jovonovich.
I am a child of the Belarus,
an orphan of your tribe...
You are bound to help me...
You are bound,
and I am owed.
Rooney, enough!
With me.
You are owed. You are owed nothing, Jardani.
translation.es: Te lo mereces. No te mereces nada, Jardani.

translation.en: You know, when my pupils first come here,
they wish for one thing, a life free of suffering.
translation.es: desean una cosa: una vida sin sufrimiento.

translation.en: I try to dissuade them from these childish notions,
translation.es: Intento disuadirlas de esas ideas infantiles,

translation.en: but as you know,
translation.es: Intento disuadirlas de esas ideas infantiles, pero, como bien sabes, el arte es sufrimiento.

translation.en: art is pain.
translation.es: pero, como bien sabes, el arte es sufrimiento.

translation.en: Life is suffering.
Somehow, you managed to get out.
But here you are, back where you began.
translation.es: Pero aquí estás, de vuelta en donde comenzaste.

translation.en: All of this, for what?
Because of a puppy?
It wasn't just a puppy.
Fond memories?
Pirouette, pirouette.
Sit.
Even if I wanted to, I can't help you, Jardani.
The High Table wants your life.
translation.es: La Orden Suprema quiere tu vida.

translation.en: How can you fight the wind?
How can you smash the mountains? How can you bury the ocean?
translation.es: ¿Cómo aplastas las montañas? ¿Cómo entierras el mar?

translation.en: How can you escape from the light?
Of course, you can go to the dark.
translation.es: Por supuesto, puedes entrar a la oscuridad.

translation.en: But they're in the dark, too.
translation.es: Pero ellos también están en la oscuridad.

translation.en: So, tell me, Jardani. What do you really want?
translation.es: Así que dime, Jardani. ¿Qué quieres en realidad?

translation.en: Passage.
Where did you want to go?
Casablanca.
The path to paradise begins in hell.
translation.es: El camino al paraíso inicia en el infierno.

translation.en: So be it.
You hand me your ticket, I will tear it.
If that's what you really desire.
translation.es: Si es lo que realmente deseas.

translation.en: With this, Jardani, your ticket is torn.
translation.es: Con esto, Jardani, tu Resguardo se destruye.

translation.en: You can never come home again.
translation.es: Ya nunca puedes volver a casa.

translation.en: Take him to the lifeboat.
Welcome to the Continental. How may I help you?
translation.es: Bienvenida al Continental. ¿En qué puedo ayudarla?

translation.en: Sir. There is an Adjudicator here to see you.
Very well, sir.
The manager is in the lounge.
translation.es: El gerente está en el salón.

translation.en: I presume you're here to discuss John Wick.
translation.es: Supongo que viene a hablar de John Wick.

translation.en: If that's so, we can make this short.
I told him to walk away, he declined to do so.
translation.es: Le dije que se fuera, él no aceptó

translation.en: And that's the all of it.
Mr Wick broke the rules. Oh, yes.
translation.es: - El Sr. Wick rompió las reglas. - Así es.

translation.en: And I haven't got the slightest idea where he is-- You're mistaken.
translation.es: - Y no tengo la menor idea de dónde… - Se equivoca.

translation.en: I'm not here for Mr Wick.
I'm here because Mr Wick broke the rules in this hotel.
translation.es: Sino porque el Sr. Wick rompió las reglas en este hotel.

translation.en: - Hmm. - The blood was spilt
translation.es: Sino porque el Sr. Wick rompió las reglas en este hotel. La sangre se derramó en el Continental, ¿no es verdad?

translation.en: on the grounds of the Continental. Was it not?
translation.es: La sangre se derramó en el Continental, ¿no es verdad?

translation.en: Oh, yes.
As a matter of fact, the body gets colder within these very walls.
translation.es: De hecho, el cadáver se enfría en estos muros.

translation.en: I'd like to see it.
Santino D'Antonio.
A newly instated member of the High Table, slain by Mr Wick
translation.es: Un miembro de la Orden Suprema asesinado por el Sr. Wick

translation.en: while seeking sanctuary in the Continental.
translation.es: cuando buscaba santuario en el Continental.

translation.en: With a .45 ACP, it appears.
I had no control over Mr Wick's actions.
translation.es: No controlo las acciones del Sr. Wick.

translation.en: And yet, he lives because you deemed it so, yes?
translation.es: Sin embargo, él vive porque usted así lo permitió, ¿no?

translation.en: Yes.
You have known Mr Wick for a great many years. It might even be fair to call you friends, yes?
translation.es: Conoce al Sr. Wick desde hace muchos años. Sería justo llamarlos amigos, ¿no?

translation.en: Instead of stopping him, instead of killing him,
translation.es: En vez de detenerlo, de matarlo,

translation.en: you stood by and let him walk away after he shot Santino D'Antonio in front of you.
translation.es: lo apoyó y lo dejó escapar después de matar a Santino D'Antonio ante usted.

translation.en: I made him excommunicado.
But not before you gave him an hour to escape.
translation.es: Pero primero le dio una hora para escapar.

translation.en: He broke the rules in my hotel.
translation.es: Rompió las reglas en mi hotel.

translation.en: This is exactly the problem, your hotel. Where is your fealty?
translation.es: Ese es justo el problema, su hotel. ¿Dónde está su fidelidad?

translation.en: I've been of service for over 40 years.
Under the Table. Serving the Table.
translation.es: A la Orden. Sirve a la Orden.

translation.en: Everything is under the Table.
translation.es: Todo es en beneficio de la Orden.

translation.en: I understand that you have your loyalties, but this cannot be overlooked.
translation.es: Entiendo que tenga lealtades, pero esto no puede ignorarse.

translation.en: Let me be clear. I am here to adjudge you.
translation.es: Seré clara, vine a adjudicarlo a usted.

translation.en: You have one week to get your affairs in order.
translation.es: Tiene una semana para resolver sus asuntos.

translation.en: Excuse me?
At such time, your successor will be named.
translation.es: Al cumplirse el plazo, su sucesor será nombrado.

translation.en: There are rules, they are the only things that separate us--
translation.es: Existen reglas. Son lo único que nos diferencia…

translation.en: - From the animals. - Yes.
You have seven days.
In the meantime, if you need any assistance with your transition,
translation.es: Mientras tanto, si necesita ayuda con su transición,

translation.en: you may look for me in room 217.
Enjoy your stay at the Continental.
translation.es: Disfrute su estancia en el Continental.

translation.en: There's an Adjudicator here to see you.
Welcome to my Mission Control.
translation.es: Bienvenida a mi Sala de Control. El cerebro de mi operación.

translation.en: Brain stem of my operation. The information super flyway
translation.es: Bienvenida a mi Sala de Control. El cerebro de mi operación. El aviario de la información. Desde donde controlo los rumores callejeros

translation.en: from whence I control the word on the street,
translation.es: El aviario de la información. Desde donde controlo los rumores callejeros

translation.en: the way of the world.
With pigeons.
Yes. You see rats with wings, but I see the Internet.
translation.es: Para usted son ratas con alas, para mí es la internet.

translation.en: No IP addresses. No digital footprint.
Can't track it, can't hack it, can't trace it.
Can you get disease from it?
Well, I wouldn't recommend that you eat one.
What the hell do you want?
I wanted to see where it didn't happen. Where what didn't happen?
translation.es: - Quería ver dónde no sucedió. - ¿No sucedió qué?

translation.en: Where you didn't kill John Wick.
translation.es: Donde no mató a John Wick.

translation.en: I've always been under the impression that contracts and executing them was optional.
translation.es: Siempre he tenido la impresión de que es opcional ejecutar los contratos.

translation.en: I have no problem with John Wick.
translation.es: No tengo problema con John Wick.

translation.en: And yet, you gave John a seven- round Kimber 1911,
translation.es: Pero le dio a John una Kimber 1911 de siete balas

translation.en: knowing that he intended to use it to stand against the Table. Yes?
translation.es: a sabiendas de que pensaba usarla en contra de la Orden, ¿no?

translation.en: This Kimber 1911, to be exact.
You gave John Wick seven bullets, the High Table is giving you seven days.
translation.es: Le dio siete balas a John Wick, la Orden Suprema le da siete días.

translation.en: Seven days for what, exactly?
To settle your affairs and find a new home for your birds.
translation.es: Para resolver sus asuntos y buscar una casa nueva para sus aves.

translation.en: In seven days, you abdicate your throne.
translation.es: En siete días abdicará su trono.

translation.en: Oh, my dear.
Tell me, do you know what the Bowery is, Adjudicator?
Do you know what happens when I wave my hand?
translation.es: ¿Sabe qué sucede cuando muevo la mano?

translation.en: No, there will be no replacement for me on the throne.
translation.es: No, mi trono no tiene reemplazo.

translation.en: Because I am the throne, baby. I am the Bowery!
translation.es: Porque yo soy el trono, nena. ¡Yo soy el Barrio!

translation.en: I am all that you deign not to look at when you walk down the street at night.
translation.es: Soy aquello que se niega a ver cuando anda por la calle de noche.

translation.en: The Bowery is mine. Mine alone.
translation.es: El Barrio es mío. Y solo mío.

translation.en: Do not make the mistake of thinking you exist outside the rules,
translation.es: No cometa el error de creer que existe por encima de las reglas.

translation.en: no men do.
You have seven days.
Enough!
I'm afraid our friend here is off limits.
translation.es: Temo que nuestro amigo está a salvo aquí.

translation.en: But he's excommunicado.
It seems the manager has granted him amnesty.
Mr Jonathan, would you be so kind as to come with me?
translation.es: Sr. Jonathan, ¿sería tan amable de venir conmigo?

translation.en: Welcome to Casablanca, Mr Wick.
- Thanks. -
Mr Jonathan, it has been a long time since our fine city has been graced with your presence.
translation.es: Sr. Jonathan, hace tiempo que no honra nuestra bella ciudad con su presencia.

translation.en: I need to talk to-- Yes, Ms Al- Azwar, she's expecting you.
translation.es: - Debo hablar… - Sí, con la Srta. Al-Azwar. Lo espera.

translation.en: My, my, welcome to the Moroccan Continental.
translation.es: Vaya, bienvenido al Continental de Marruecos.

translation.en: I hope you'll find it to your taste.
translation.es: Espero que sea de su agrado.

translation.en: Right this way. Ms Al- Azwar, she waits for no man.
translation.es: Por aquí. La Srta. Al-Azwar no espera a ningún hombre.

translation.en: Best of luck, Mr Jonathan. Best of luck.
translation.es: Mucha suerte, Sr. Jonathan. Mucha suerte.

translation.en: You a dog person, John?
- - Sofia?
Sofia! You can't kill the bearer of your marker.
translation.es: ¡Sofia, no puedes matar a quien tiene tu ficha!

translation.en: I didn't kill you. I just shot you.
translation.es: No te maté, solo te disparé.

translation.en: Nice suit.
Good to see you, too. I should shoot you in the head right now.
translation.es: - También me da gusto verte. - Debería dispararte en la cabeza ahora.

translation.en: I know.
Don't you do it.
You're excommunicado, John.
And that marker doesn't mean shit.
This is your blood.
Your bond.
When you needed help... I was there.
Sit.
I was talking to you, John.
You do realise that I'm management now, right?
translation.es: Sí te das cuenta de que ahora yo soy la gerente, ¿verdad?

translation.en: I'm not service any more, John. So, I don't go around shooting people in the head.
translation.es: Ya no estoy en servicio, John, así que no ando por ahí matando gente.

translation.en: I'm not asking you to kill anyone.
translation.es: No te pido que mates a nadie.

translation.en: I just need you to get me to him.
translation.es: - Solo quiero que me lleves con él. - ¿Con quién?

translation.en: - To who? - Your old boss.
translation.es: - Solo quiero que me lleves con él. - ¿Con quién? Tu antiguo jefe.

translation.en: You want to kill Berrada. I'm not gonna kill him. I just need to talk.
translation.es: - Quieres matar a Berrada. - No voy a matarlo, solo quiero hablar.

translation.en: What could he possibly give to you?
Guidance.
Look, I made a deal when I agreed to run this hotel.
translation.es: Escucha. Hice un acuerdo cuando acepté administrar este hotel.

translation.en: And that deal said that I had to follow the rules of the Table.
translation.es: Y ese acuerdo decía que debía obedecer las reglas de la Orden.

translation.en: If you're not gonna kill him, he is gonna kill you,
translation.es: Si tú no lo matas, él te matará,

translation.en: and then probably me, too, for walking you up in there.
translation.es: y quizá a mí también por llevarte allá.

translation.en: If I make one mistake, one enemy...
translation.es: Y si cometo un error, si me hago de un enemigo…

translation.en: maybe somebody goes looking for my daughter.
translation.es: …quizá alguien vaya a buscar a mi hija.

translation.en: And I know what you did, John, to get her out.
translation.es: Sé lo que hiciste para rescatarla, John.

translation.en: But that's not a chance I can take. Sorry.
translation.es: Pero no puedo correr ese riesgo. Lo siento.

translation.en: Do you wanna know where she is?
No. I don't ever wanna know,
because I don't trust that I won't go find her.
translation.es: Porque sé que iré a buscarla.

translation.en: A part of me longs for her.
translation.es: Una parte de mí desea verla.

translation.en: And I have to kill that part of myself every day,
translation.es: Tengo que matar esa parte de mí todos los días

translation.en: just to keep her safe.
Because sometimes you have to kill what you love.
translation.es: Porque a veces… …tienes que matar lo que amas.

translation.en: That's why I gave you that marker in the first place.
translation.es: Por eso te pedí el favor,

translation.en: That's why I'm sitting here right now, and that's why I'm fucked!
translation.es: por eso estoy aquí sentada ahora y por eso estoy acabada.

translation.en: - Consequences. - Yeah.
Consequences.
I'm just asking you to try.
translation.es: Solo te pido que lo intentes.

translation.en: Either way, you and me, we'll be even.
translation.es: De cualquier forma, tú y yo estaremos a mano.

translation.en: No.
After this, we are less than even.
translation.es: Después de esto… …aún no estamos a mano.

translation.en: We leave in ten minutes.
How can I help you?
I wasn't expecting the High Table so soon.
translation.es: No esperaba a la Orden Suprema tan pronto.

translation.en: There is a task.
It involves someone who broke the rules and stood against the Table.
translation.es: Tiene que ver con alguien que rompió las reglas y desafió a la Orden.

translation.en: John Wick, you mean.
My students have not been idle.
John Wick and all who've helped him.
translation.es: A John Wick y a todos aquellos que lo ayuden.

translation.en: You've heard the stories about him, of course.
translation.es: Ha oído historias sobre él, claro.

translation.en: Killed scores of men this past week alone because of--
translation.es: Mató a muchos hombres la semana pasada solo por…

translation.en: A dog, a car.
I'm familiar.
And I'm interested.
Very.
Blowfish. Very fatal.
No soy.
I have served, I will be of service.
- Stop! -
Out!
The High Table and the Ruska Roma have an understanding.
translation.es: La Orden Suprema y la Roma Ruska tienen un acuerdo.

translation.en: Yes, and you helped John Wick.
translation.es: Sí, pero ayudó a John Wick.

translation.en: He had a ticket. But a ticket does not stand above the Table.
translation.es: - Tenía un Resguardo. - Que no es más importante que la Orden.

translation.en: Your penance will be paid in blood.
Now...
hold out your helping hands and pledge your fealty.
translation.es: Extienda sus manos solidarias y jure fidelidad.

translation.en: I have served, I will be of service.
We're not going in like the old days.
translation.es: No lo haremos como en el pasado.

translation.en: It's just a conversation.
Nothing's ever just a conversation with you, John.
translation.es: John, contigo nunca es solo una conversación.

translation.en: Let's go.
Sofia.
Always so nice to see you.
And the dogs, of course, how marvellous. May I pet one?
translation.es: Y a los perros, claro. Qué maravilla. - ¿Puedo acariciar a uno? - Por supuesto.

translation.en: Certainly.
Fantastic.
Jonathan Wick.
I had heard you had made your way to our shores.
translation.es: Supe que había llegado a nuestra costa.

translation.en: Come along now. I am certain we have much to discuss.
translation.es: Vamos. Estoy seguro de que tenemos mucho de qué hablar.

translation.en: I must admit, I am curious. What brings you to my domain?
translation.es: Debo admitir que tengo curiosidad. ¿Qué lo trae a mis dominios?

translation.en: Do you come here to kill me?
No.
Mr Wick, do you know where the word assassin comes from?
translation.es: Sr. Wick, ¿sabe de dónde viene la palabra asesino?

translation.en: People argue... Assassin.
Hashasheen, followers of Hassan- i...
eaters of hashish.
No, thank you.
But others contend it comes from asāsiyyūn,
translation.es: Otros sostienen que proviene de asasiyyun,

translation.en: meaning, men who are faithful and who abide by their beliefs.
translation.es: que significa hombres que son fieles… …y que respetan sus creencias.

translation.en: You see that coin?
The first coin ever minted in this facility.
translation.es: Es la primera moneda acuñada en este lugar.

translation.en: Next to it, the first marker.
translation.es: A su lado, está la primera ficha.

translation.en: Not easy to track down, believe me.
Now, this coin, of course, it does not represent monetary value.
translation.es: Esta moneda, por supuesto, no representa un valor monetario.

translation.en: It represents the commerce of relationships,
translation.es: Representa el comercio de las relaciones,

translation.en: a social contract in which you agree to partake.
translation.es: un contrato social en el que acepta participar.

translation.en: Order and rules.
You have broken the rules.
The High Table has marked you for death.
translation.es: La Orden Suprema lo quiere muerto.

translation.en: Why would I allow you to leave here alive,
translation.es: ¿Por qué permitiría que se marchara con vida

translation.en: when your life has been, by your own actions, forfeit?
translation.es: cuando sus propias acciones la pusieron en juego?

translation.en: I seek to make amends,
to pay for what I've done.
translation.es: Para pagar por lo que hice,

translation.en: I seek a meeting with the one who sits above the Table.
translation.es: solicito una reunión con quien está por encima de la Orden…

translation.en: This dog, I do so love it.
Tell me, does it shed a great deal?
Occasionally.
When I leave, you can tell the Elder I'm coming.
translation.es: Cuando me vaya, dígale al Regente que iré.

translation.en: And if he wants me dead-- Then he will see to it that your bones bleach under the sun.
translation.es: - Y que si me quiere muerto… - Hará que sus huesos se sequen al sol.

translation.en: I see.
And I would have provided him with a choice.
translation.es: Y yo le habré dado la opción.

translation.en: I am sorry, Mr Wick.
I cannot tell you where to find the Elder.
translation.es: No puedo decirle dónde buscar al Regente.

translation.en: You fail to understand.
The Elder is not a man you find. He can only choose to find you.
translation.es: Usted no busca al Regente, él decide encontrarlo a usted.

translation.en: You wish to speak with him?
Go to the edge of the desert, look up.
translation.es: Intérnese en el desierto y levante la vista.

translation.en: Canis Minor, the dog that followed Orion through the sky.
translation.es: Canis Menor, el perro que siguió a Orión a través del cielo.

translation.en: You follow the brightest star. Walk until you are almost dead.
translation.es: Siga la estrella más brillante, camine hasta que esté casi muerto.

translation.en: Then, keep walking.
When you are on your last breath,
translation.es: Cuando esté por exhalar el último suspiro, él lo encontrará.

translation.en: he will find you. Or he will not.
translation.es: Cuando esté por exhalar el último suspiro, él lo encontrará. O no.

translation.en: I am grateful.
Thank you, sir.
Perhaps you were not listening before.
The social contract.
The commerce of relationships.
You have received a great gift.
I have hosted your friend.
What do you offer in return?
So soft, and yet, so fierce.
translation.es: Tan suave y al mismo tiempo tan agresivo.

translation.en: I love it, this dog.
I will keep it.
Excuse me? This will be my gift.
This will be how you show me your fealty. No.
Surely it's the least you can do. No, you cannot keep my dog.
translation.es: - Es lo menos que puedes hacer. - No, no puede quedarse con mi perro.

translation.en: Very well.
Very well.
Then I will kill it.
I'm sorry, Sofia.
This was for you to learn.
Don't.
Sofia. Don't.
He shot my dog.
I get it.
We gotta go. Now.
Here you go.
You're gonna die, John.
Whether out here in this desert,
or somewhere else down the road.
translation.es: o en algún punto del camino.

translation.en: But you are gonna die.
Consequences.
Consequences.
Better get going.
Sofia.
Okay.
You made your point.
You have earned my fealty.
Matter of fact, I'm gonna shove so much fealty up your ass it's gonna come spilling out of your mouth.
translation.es: Voy a meterle tanta lealtad por el trasero que se le va a salir por la boca.

translation.en: You had your chance.
Well, since you see it that way,
translation.es: Bueno, ya que lo ve de esa manera…

translation.en: I guess it's time I told you to climb down off your High Table
translation.es: …es hora de que le diga que se baje de su Orden Suprema y se vaya al infierno.

translation.en: and go fuck yourself.
translation.es: que se baje de su Orden Suprema y se vaya al infierno.

translation.en: Duly noted.
You gave John Wick seven bullets, your penance will be paid with seven cuts.
translation.es: Le dio siete balas a John Wick, pagará su castigo con siete cortes.

translation.en: Well, sometimes you gotta cut a motherfucker.
translation.es: A veces hay que cortar algunas cosas.

translation.en: Avert your eyes, my sweet.
The king is dead.
Long live the king.
Drink.
Don't worry, your weapon is still there. Please drink.
translation.es: Tranquilo, aún tienes tu arma. Bebe, por favor.

translation.en: My son, how have you come to be so lost?
Not lost.
Looking for you.  You think I speak of your location?
translation.es: - Vine a buscarlo. - ¿Crees que me refiero a tu ubicación?

translation.en: Never seen a man fight so hard to end up back where he started.
translation.es: Nunca vi a un hombre luchar tanto por terminar donde comenzó.

translation.en: So, tell me, Jonathan.
Why do you wish to live?
My wife, Helen.
To remember her. To remember us.
So, you seek to live for the memory of love?
translation.es: ¿Quieres vivir por el recuerdo del amor?

translation.en: At least a chance to earn it.
translation.es: Al menos por la oportunidad de merecerlo.

translation.en: I can give you one last chance to earn a life.
translation.es: Puedo darte una última oportunidad de ganarte una vida.

translation.en: However, it might not be the life that you wish.
translation.es: Sin embargo, podría no ser la que deseas.

translation.en: Complete a task for us, and your excommunicado will be reversed,
translation.es: Realiza una tarea para nosotros, y se revocará tu Excomunicado.

translation.en: the open contract closed.
You would be permitted to continue to live.
translation.es: Se te permitirá vivir, aunque no libre de la Orden,

translation.en: Not free under the Table, but bound to it.
translation.es: Se te permitirá vivir, aunque no libre de la Orden, sino obligado a ella, haciendo lo que mejor haces el resto de tus días.

translation.en: Doing what you do best for the rest of your days.
translation.es: sino obligado a ella, haciendo lo que mejor haces el resto de tus días.

translation.en: The choice is yours.
Die here and now,
or continue to live and remember through death.
translation.es: o sigue vivo y recordando hasta la muerte.

translation.en: What must be done?
The cost of your life will be the death of others,
translation.es: Tu vida costará la vida de otros.

translation.en: the first of which will be the man they call Winston.
translation.es: La primera será la del hombre al que llaman Winston.

translation.en: What? He has forgotten his fealty.
Neither the open contract nor the excommunicado
translation.es: No se revocarán el contrato abierto ni el Excomunicado

translation.en: will be lifted until you complete your task.
translation.es: No se revocarán el contrato abierto ni el Excomunicado hasta que termines la misión.

translation.en: So, if you wish to live,
and if you wish to remember,
this is the choice you must make.
translation.es: esta es la decisión que debes tomar.

translation.en: I will serve.
I will be of service.
Very well, my son.
Cast aside your weakness
translation.es: Haz a un lado tu debilidad

translation.en: and reaffirm your fealty to the table.
translation.es: y reafirma tu fidelidad a la Orden.

translation.en: Mr John Wick.
I want to see.
Show me.
Thank you.
I accept this offering and your fealty.
translation.es: Acepto esta ofrenda y su fidelidad.

translation.en: I wish you good luck on your path.
translation.es: Le deseo buena suerte en su camino.

translation.en: Zahir will help you prepare for your departure.
translation.es: Zahir ayudará a preparar su partida.

translation.en: And, Mr Wick...
Welcome back.
JFK Express now arriving on platform nine.
translation.es: El expreso JFK está llegando a la plataforma nueve.

translation.en: JFK Express now arriving on platform nine.
translation.es: El expreso JFK está llegando a la plataforma nueve.

translation.en: Stick together, kids.
Make sure you're holding the hand of the person in front and behind you.
translation.es: Tomen la mano de la persona que va adelante y atrás de ustedes.

translation.en: You see? That's why you're special, John Wick.
translation.es: ¿Ves? Por eso eres especial, John Wick.

translation.en: I wouldn't have stopped.
It's good to have you back.
How was your trip?
Going to the Continental?
He with you?
- - He was.
Nice trick.
Sir! Put your weapon down.
He's excommunicado.
Unless you wish to become the same...
translation.es: A menos que usted también quiera lo mismo…

translation.en: I suggest you lower your gun.
I'd like to see the manager.
Of course.
If you would be so kind as to follow me.
translation.es: Si fuera tan amable de acompañarme.

translation.en: Please take a seat.
I will let him know you have arrived.
I gotta tell you, I've been looking forward to meeting you for a long time.
translation.es: Debo decirte que esperaba conocerte desde hace tiempo.

translation.en: I'm a huge fan. John Wick.
And so far, you haven't disappointed.
translation.es: Y, hasta ahora, no me has decepcionado.

translation.en: Is that the dog?
He likes you.
Me? I'm more of a cat person myself.
translation.es: Pero a mí me gustan más los gatos.

translation.en: Hey, dog.
We're the same, you know. Both given the same gift.
translation.es: Somos iguales. Ambos tenemos el mismo don.

translation.en: We're not the same.
Yes, we are.
No, we're not.
The manager is ready for you now.
In the administrative lounge, sir.
We're both masters of death.
translation.es: Los dos somos maestros de la muerte.

translation.en: Mr Wick.
Sit.
Stay.
Good dog.
Tread carefully, Jonathan.
We only use this room on special occasions,
translation.es: Solo uso esta habitación en ocasiones especiales,

translation.en: when you simply have to see what your opponent is holding under the table.
translation.es: cuando simplemente hay que ver lo que el oponente esconde bajo la mesa.

translation.en: How was your journey here? Eventful?
Yeah. Well, of course.
They sent men to kill you, and now you to kill me.
translation.es: Enviaron hombres a matarte y ahora te enviaron a matarme.

translation.en: Isn't that why you're here?
I have served... I will be of service.
But you're having doubts.
Just don't make the mistake of pretending this is personal.
translation.es: Solo no cometas el error de fingir que es personal.

translation.en: If you feel you must...
put a bullet through my heart.
The High Table has asked me to step down.
translation.es: La Orden Suprema me ha pedido que dimita.

translation.en: The hour?
The hour. You should have killed me in the Continental.
translation.es: - La Hora. - Debiste matarme en el Continental.

translation.en: Maybe I should have.
Rules and consequences.
It seems like everyone is suffering from the consequences of their actions.
translation.es: Parece que todos están pagando las consecuencias de sus acciones.

translation.en: And you're not stepping down?
No.
I don't think I am.
So, it's war?
You're going to war with the High Table?
translation.es: ¿Le declararás la guerra a la Orden Suprema?

translation.en: Skirmish.
Unless you decide to shoot me.
translation.es: A menos que decidas matarme, porque entonces prefiero morir

translation.en: But then, I'd rather die at the hand of a friend
translation.es: A menos que decidas matarme, porque entonces prefiero morir a manos de un amigo que de un enemigo.

translation.en: than that of an enemy.
translation.es: a manos de un amigo que de un enemigo.

translation.en: No, I've made my choice. It's up to you to make yours.
translation.es: Ya tomé una decisión, ahora te corresponde tomar la tuya.

translation.en: What choice?
You shoot me, you sell your soul.
translation.es: - Si me matas, vendes tu alma. - Pero viviré.

translation.en: But I'll be alive. And I can remember her.
translation.es: - Si me matas, vendes tu alma. - Pero viviré. Y podré recordarla.

translation.en: Until you die as a servant of the High Table.
translation.es: Hasta que mueras como siervo de la Orden Suprema.

translation.en: Now, you did the impossible, you stopped, you got out.
translation.es: Hiciste lo imposible, te detuviste y saliste.

translation.en: You only came back because Helen was taken away from you.
translation.es: Volviste solo porque te arrebataron a Helen.

translation.en: The real question is, who do you wish to die as?
translation.es: La verdadera pregunta es: ¿Cómo quién quieres morir?

translation.en: The Baba Yaga?
The last thing many men ever see?
Or as a man who loved and was loved by his wife?
translation.es: ¿O como un hombre que amó y fue amado por su esposa?

translation.en: Who do you wish to die as, Jonathan?
Mr Wick, it's a pleasure to meet you. I am an Adjudicator.
translation.es: Sr. Wick. Es un placer conocerlo. Soy una adjudicadora.

translation.en: Have you decided to step down?
I think not.
And you? Will you be putting a bullet in his head?
translation.es: ¿Y usted? ¿Piensa darle un tiro en la sien?

translation.en: No, I don't think I will.
translation.es: No. Creo que no lo haré.

translation.en: Very well.
Administration.
I'd like to change a designation.
Verification?
Adjudication 1- 0- 1- 1- 9- 7- 9.
translation.es: Adjudicación. Uno, cero, uno, uno, nueve, siete, nueve.

translation.en: The Continental Hotel, New York.
New designation?
Deconsecrated.
Processing.
Administrator.
File, the New York Continental Hotel.
translation.es: Archivo. El hotel Continental de Nueva York.

translation.en: The New York Continental Hotel has been deconsecrated. Goodbye.
translation.es: El hotel Continental de Nueva York ha quedado desacralizado. Adiós.

translation.en: Gentlemen, this institution is now deconsecrated.
translation.es: Caballeros, este sitio ha sido desacralizado.

translation.en: Business may now be conducted on Continental grounds.
translation.es: Pueden efectuarse transacciones en terrenos del hotel.

translation.en: Since you are refusing to step down,
translation.es: Como usted se niega a dimitir y usted a cumplir una orden directa,

translation.en: and you are refusing a direct order, your lives are now forfeit.
translation.es: Como usted se niega a dimitir y usted a cumplir una orden directa, sus vidas serán eliminadas.

translation.en: High Table emissaries will be joining you presently
translation.es: Emisarios de la Orden Suprema se presentarán en breve

translation.en: to see the removal of your souls from the property.
translation.es: para retirar sus almas de la propiedad.

translation.en: Good evening, gentlemen.
This haven is safe no more.
translation.es: Este santuario ya no es seguro.

translation.en: Are services still off limits to me?
translation.es: ¿Ya no tengo acceso a ninguno de los servicios?

translation.en: Under the circumstances, your privileges are reinstated immediately.
translation.es: Dadas las circunstancias, tus privilegios quedan restaurados de inmediato.

translation.en: What do you need?
Guns. Lots of guns.
Let's make a withdrawal.
Remember, sir.
These will be High Table forces.
translation.es: Estas serán fuerzas de la Orden Suprema.

translation.en: We may have to consider our choices carefully.
translation.es: Debemos considerar nuestras opciones con cuidado.

translation.en: Why?
Much has changed during your time away.
translation.es: Muchas cosas cambiaron durante su ausencia.

translation.en: Like what?
Well, let us say they have made armour improvements.
translation.es: Digamos que hemos mejorado el armamento.

translation.en: May I suggest the 2011 Combat Master
in combination with the nine millimetre major.
translation.es: combinada con la 9 mm de balas largas?

translation.en: Attention, all guests.
The Continental Hotel is closing for fumigation.
translation.es: El hotel Continental cerrará para ser fumigado.

translation.en: We apologise for the inconvenience. Please make your way to the nearest exit.
translation.es: Nos disculpamos por el inconveniente. Por favor, tomen la salida más cercana.

translation.en: Attention, all guests. The Continental Hotel...
It seems circumstances have changed in your favour.
translation.es: Las circunstancias cambiaron a su favor.

translation.en: Your transaction may now be conducted on Continental grounds.
translation.es: Puede realizar su transacción en el Continental.

translation.en: We'll be sending some of our finest for additional support.
translation.es: Enviaremos a nuestros mejores elementos para que le den apoyo.

translation.en: Cool. Very cool.
125 grain, 1,425 feet per second.
Serious business.
Thank you.
Let us begin.
Charon, would you help set the mood for our new guests?
translation.es: Charon, ¿ayudarías a crear el ambiente para nuestras visitas?

translation.en: Of course, sir.
I know you'll do the Continental proud.
translation.es: Sé que harás que el Continental se sienta orgulloso.

translation.en: I'll see you soon, sir.
And you, Jonathan, do what you do best.
translation.es: Y tú, Jonathan, haz lo que mejor sabes hacer.

translation.en: What's that?
Hunt.
If you want peace
prepare for war
Winston! Winston!
I need more firepower.
Armour improvements.
Twelve- gauge steel slugs. Armour- piercing.
No one kills you but me.
Only by my sword, John.
I know you believe you can keep this up. But I assure you--
translation.es: Cree que puede seguir con esto, pero le aseguro…

translation.en: Nice to meet you, Mr Wick.
It's an honour to fight with you, Mr Wick.
translation.es: Es un honor pelear contra usted, Sr. Wick.

translation.en: He's getting slow.
He's been retired for five years.
translation.es: Hace cinco años que se retiró.

translation.en: But he is still... John Wick.
We will see.
Be seeing you.
John, you're incredible.
Exhausted,
outnumbered,
obviously in pain...
and you still beat all of my students.
translation.es: …y aun así venciste a mis pupilos.

translation.en: If I didn't have to kill you,
we'd be... pals.
Let's do this.
See? We're the same.
I would like to suggest a parley.
A parley would be good. Very well.
Are we in play, sir?
Oh, very much so.
Hey, John.
That was a pretty good fight, huh?
Yeah.
Yeah.
Don't worry about me, John.
translation.es: No te preocupes por mí, John.

translation.en: I just gotta catch my breath.
I'll catch up to you, John.
No, you won't.
You gentlemen, of course, realise that was the first wave.
translation.es: Caballeros, desde luego saben que fue la primera ronda.

translation.en: Merely an amuse- bouche.
We can keep this up as long as you'd like, but it only ends one way.
translation.es: Podemos seguir así el tiempo que quieran, pero tiene un solo final.

translation.en: Are you sure a protracted war is the best way forward?
translation.es: ¿Está segura de que una guerra prolongada es lo mejor?

translation.en: There won't be anything protracted about it.
Oh, you can take the Continental, I have no doubt about that.
translation.es: Podrán tomar el Continental, no tengo duda,

translation.en: But keeping it, that's a different matter entirely.
translation.es: pero conservarlo es un asunto muy diferente.

translation.en: My allegiances run way beyond this building.
translation.es: Mis lealtades van más allá de este edificio.

translation.en: We are High Table.
And we...
are New York City.
- Are we negotiating? -
I believe we are.
Parley?
Parley.
What do you propose we do?
Let me keep my power.
Under the Table.
I have served
and been a beacon of order and stability to our industry for over 40 years.
translation.es: y he sido un modelo de orden y estabilidad en la industria por más de 40 años. Reconozco humildemente que me excedí

translation.en: Now, I humbly acknowledge I overstepped,
translation.es: por más de 40 años. Reconozco humildemente que me excedí

translation.en: and re- pledge my fealty to the High Table.
translation.es: y reitero mi fidelidad a la Orden Suprema.

translation.en: Winston.
You were merely showing strength so we would let you keep the Continental.
translation.es: Solo demostró su fuerza para poder conservar el Continental.

translation.en: The High Table accepts your fealty.
translation.es: La Orden Suprema acepta su fidelidad.

translation.en: But what about him?
What are we going to do about John Wick?
translation.es: ¿Qué vamos a hacer con John Wick?

translation.en: Oh, he has to die.
- Sorry, Jonathan. - Winston!
Don't see any other way.
Very well, gentlemen.
The Continental will now be reconsecrated.
translation.es: El Continental volverá a ser Sacralizado.

translation.en: Good day to you both.
Well played, sir.
How long do you estimate until we reopen?
translation.es: ¿Cuánto tiempo calcula que tardaremos en abrir?

translation.en: Oh, should be no time at all.
Mr Wick is gone.
translation.es: El Sr. Wick se ha ido.

translation.en: A true tragedy.
You misunderstand. I mean that he is no longer on the street.
translation.es: No entendió. Quise decir que ya no está en la calle.

translation.en: That seems improbable. And yet, true.
I trust you understand the repercussions if he survives,
translation.es: Confío en que comprende que habrá repercusiones

translation.en: both from above and below.
translation.es: a todos los niveles si sobrevive.

translation.en: The last thing either one of us needs is Mr Wick paying us a visit in the night.
translation.es: Lo último que usted o yo queremos es que el Sr. Wick nos visite por la noche.

translation.en: For both our sakes, I'll hope you see to it that this situation is taken care of, yes?
translation.es: Por el bien de ambos, espero que se encargue de la situación, ¿sí?

translation.en: Absolutely. How far can he get?
translation.es: Desde luego. ¿Qué tan lejos puede ir?

translation.en: Baba Yaga.
How you doing, John?
You look as bad as I feel.
translation.es: Luces tan mal como me siento.

translation.en: Johnny, Johnny, Johnny.
Raise a hand if you can hear me, John.
translation.es: Levanta la mano si me escuchas, John.

translation.en: Oh, shit. They took a finger. Ain't that a bitch?
translation.es: ¡Maldita sea, te cortaron un dedo! ¿No es terrible?

translation.en: Oh, John fucking Wick.
So, the old boy keeps his hotel and you take the fall.
translation.es: El muchacho conserva su hotel y te sacrifica.

translation.en: Can't say I blame him. I would've done the same thing if I was in his shoes.
translation.es: No lo culpo. Yo habría hecho lo mismo que él.

translation.en: But this High Table shit...
translation.es: Pero lo que hizo la Orden Suprema…

translation.en: Seven cuts.
Under the Table is where shit gets done.
translation.es: Las cosas se hacen sin la Orden.

translation.en: And they're about to find out, if you cut a king,
translation.es: Y están a punto de descubrir que si atacan al rey,

translation.en: you better cut him to the quick.
So...
let me ask you, John.
How do you feel?
'Cause I am really pissed off.
You pissed, John?
Are you?
Yeah.
